summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for disposition of certain monies seized and forfeited and proceeds of the sale of goods and materials seized and forfeited pursuant to the Uniform Controlled Substances Act; accepting such forfeitures; appropriating such monies to reimburse expenses incurred by the Police and Law Departments and to expand programs of the Police and Law Departments to enforce narcotic and other drug enforcement laws; creating and authorizing the filling of a position in the Police Department; and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 2001 Budgets of the Police and Law Departments by reimbursable appropriation from the General Subfund by three-fourths vote.
